H3.text: when is the last time the us lost the olympics. 2018 Pyeongchang

A4.text: The United States finished at the top of the table, winning 48 gold medals and a total of 104 medals.

A5.text: China finished second with 38 gold medals and 91 medals overall, and hosts Great Britain came in third place, winning 29 gold medals and 65 medals overall.
